Bridgnorth - Small99's People, Planet, Pint™: Sustainability Meetup

24 September 2025 – 24 September 2025

Small99 The Black Boy Inn, The Black Boy Inn, 58 Cartway, Bridgnorth WV16 4BG, UK

Pop down to your local People Planet Pint meetup to find more about what's going on locally with sustainability and how you can get involved

Pop down to your local

People Planet Pint

meetup to find more about what's going on locally with sustainability and how you can get involved.

No pitches, powerpoints or panels. Just People, Planet, Pint/s.

Your local meetup is a great place to start your journey or continue learning, and meet diverse people to chat about life and how we can sustain it. Every job is a climate job, so come along and learn about how you can take action, as well as what is going on locally.

We welcome everyone, regardless of their experience or background. People Planet Pint is a space where everyone can feel comfortable learning about sustainability and sharing their ideas.

Afterall, creating a sustainable future requires connected communities. And what better way to bring everyone together than over a drink?

Prefer a Pastry to a Pint? Head along to ‘

People Planet Pastry

’! Equally relaxed and welcoming, they run during the day and offer an informal way to learn about what is going on locally in sustainability.

Your Volunteer Hosts

Craig Thomas

Hello! I'm Craig, owner of a web design agency committed to sustainability. My passion for the environment inspired me to use my skills for good, helping brands make a positive impact on the world. We craft digital experiences that reflect our clients' dedication to a greener future.

Outside of work, I enjoy the countryside life with my daughter and our dog, Oona. My personal and professional lives are intertwined by a common thread: a commitment to sustainability, making a difference one website at a time.

Anna Rose Bowler

Hi, I'm

Anna

, an ex-geography teacher and current marketeer. I work mostly with charities to help them share news of their wonderful work

.

I've always cared about the planet and the people in it –  and being a human geographer – I have a keen interest in people, and I love to meet new people, learn new things, and make new connections. I believe together we can make a difference. I look forward to welcoming you to PPP.

Our Sponsor

KRYSTAL

are an award-winning, 100% renewably powered web hosting provider, with datacentres in the UK, US, & Europe. They are climate positive, and their approach centres on value, quality and transparency.

We are delighted to announce our partnership with Krystal (the UK's only B Corp web hosting/cloud provider), and welcome them on board as sponsors of the People, Planet, Pint events.

This means

the first 33 drinks

are on Krystal at every event, and has allowed us to invest and upscale the series to accelerate action on climate change.

Simon Blackler

is the founder of

KRYSTAL

, and Co-Founder of

MillionTreePledge

.

About Us

Small99

provides carbon reduction plans for micro and small businesses. With a simple measurement tool and practical actions broken down into 10 minute to-do lists, Small99 empowers the 99% of businesses to start on their sustainability journey, and win more customers while doing so.

Impact Orbit Creative Group

Impact Orbit Creative Group is a multi-disciplinary consultancy and innovation hub focused on driving sustainable growth, digital transformation, and impact-led strategies in the space and technology sectors. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to deliver strategic guidance, communications expertise, and frameworks for responsible innovation.
